name: gokkan-keeper
description: Personal asset tracking service organized by purpose (granaries)

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter web dev & pnpm --filter api dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter api build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter shared typecheck && pnpm --filter web typecheck && pnpm --filter api typecheck
scripts.setup: nvm install 18.20.0 && nvm use && corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@latest --activate && pnpm install && pnpm --filter shared build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
